title: Ward skins
body: My ward skin (Ginderbread ward skin) has disappeared from my ward skins selection, I have checked in the shop to see if its there but its not. Please help get ward skin back

replies.body: This issue is just a visual bug that's happening right now. Your ward skin is unlocked on the account, but there is currently an issue preventing it from being selected.  I don't have an eta for a fix on this right now, but I hope that helps bring you some ease!
alright as long as I will be getting it back im fine
Thanks for the update as i was having the same issue. :)
